content:
Plenum - Dynamical Grammar Simulator

Plenum is a simulation software written in Mathematica for dynamical grammar models. Dynamical grammars are an elegant language for representing complex processes that include stochastic events and continuous dynamics.

Applications for dynamical grammars that were modeled in Plenum include: tissue development with stochastic cellular events and diffusion of signaling molecules, complex chemical reactions and simulations of spiral galaxy formation.

To download Plenum continue to the license agreement.
